root: ^Argh, another traveler I suppose. What do you want?

c-0: ^ Yes, I am a traveler. But, don't be rude. I have some questions, may I be so nice to ask them?
c-1: ^ Hi, I have some questions. May I?

c-0: ^ I noticed something corrupted over there.
^That...that is something that you should never tamper with. You go in there and you'll never see the light again.
c-1: ^ Noticed a small cemetery. Whats that all about?
^Don't get me started on those damn't things. They was supposed to use the extra money to move the dang thing in another place.

c-0: ^The town was supposed to move the cemetery in a more fitting place. They done used the money to create a private home for The Olster! Now it here.
^The Olster is the head of the town here. Some call her a peacemaker, some call her a dictator. Dictator it is! Have ya seen her?

c-2: ^Kurt Wesslton. Best man and business in town.

c-0: ^ Yes, the best man in town in the middle of a forest, alone?
^ Sorry. Why do you live alone, though?
^None of those villagers like me. All o' em think I'm a freak because I came from another place.

c-1: ^ Why do you live alone, especially in a forest?
^None of those villagers like me. All o' em think I'm a freak because I came from another place.

c-3: ^ Sorry, I did not mean to talk to you. I'll leave now.
